revised_title: Asymptotic Expansions and Converging Factors: Lommel, Struve, Modified Struve, Anger, and Weber Functions, and Integrals of Ordinary and Modified Bessel Functions
tldr: This article presents a theory of Lommel functions and their applications to Struve, modified Struve, Anger, and Weber functions, as well as integrals of ordinary and modified Bessel functions. The authors develop methods to replace the divergent parts of asymptotic expansions with easily calculable series involving converging factors, which are then applied to various special cases.
